tooltip.relics.static_rifle.leveling: Powerful rifle that produces energy bursts, not harming the owner though.
tooltip.relics.static_rifle.ability.bzzs: Static Rifle generates a burst of static energy. Upon hitting an enemy, it will move on to the next one. Next hit entities receive the half of previous damage. When upgraded to max level, four additional weak spheres will be generated.
tooltip.relics.static_rifle.ability.forc: Static Rifle compresses the energy to create a forcefield. Enemies in the forcefield will receive the Static effect.
tooltip.relics.morphcook.leveling: This little cook uses morphing objects to cook them, it can even turn any type of flesh and meat into nutrition for your body!
tooltip.relics.morphcook.ability.passive: Morph-cook morphs the objects into cooked ones. Works the same as the Smoker, add more Morph-cooks to speed up the process.
tooltip.relics.morphcook.ability.fleshfe: Morph-cook gets a bit of flesh from nearby mobs and feeds you up with it. Health-friendly, of course.
tooltip.relics.whirlwind_spear.leveling: Mystical spear brought from deep seas. Become your own Neptune.
tooltip.relics.whirlwind_spear.ability.w: Spear creates sea storm, that sucks all the enemies and slowly drowns them.
tooltip.relics.whirlwind_spear.ability.b: Spear covers player into the bubble that makes them invulnerable and immovable.
